fact_check_explanation_title: The nurses that treated Boris Johnson for coronavirus are real UK nurses
fact_check_explanation_summary: Both are registered nurses working at St Thomas’s hospital.

fact_check_explanation_title: No, the UK didn’t turn down 50,000 ventilators offered by the EU
fact_check_explanation_summary: The UK did not join an EU scheme to stockpile medical equipment. However, even if the UK had joined this scheme, the budget would deliver nowhere near 50,000 ventilators across …

fact_check_explanation_title: Facebook post on how to make a silent 999 call is misleading
fact_check_explanation_summary: If you can’t talk on an emergency call, this is what to do.

fact_check_explanation_title: Government misses one of its Covid-19 test targets
fact_check_explanation_summary: Government committed to 25,000 tests a day by mid-April, later relaxed to “mid to late April”. Latest figures show 18,665 tests a day.

fact_check_explanation_title: The NHS is not asking people with type O negative blood to go to donate at Manchester Royal Infirmary
fact_check_explanation_summary: NHS Blood and Transplant have said that the post asking for donors in Manchester is fake.

fact_check_explanation_title: False posts that suggest Boris Johnson didn’t have Covid-19 are based on a blog post now labelled as satire
fact_check_explanation_summary: The claims first appeared in the Dorset Eye and now say they may be satire, but some people seem to have believed them.

fact_check_explanation_title: Claim that Conservatives voted against a nurse pay rise needs some context
fact_check_explanation_summary: In 2017 the Conservatives voted against a Labour amendment aiming to end the public sector pay rise cap, before ending it themselves anyway for the next financial year.

fact_check_explanation_title: How does the new coronavirus affect pregnancy?
fact_check_explanation_summary: There is currently no evidence to suggest that pregnant women or their unborn babies are at higher risk from Covid-19.

fact_check_explanation_title: If you need the police but can’t talk, dial 999 from a mobile, then 55 when prompted and don’t hang up
fact_check_explanation_summary: If you can’t talk but need the police, you can dial 55 when prompted on a 999 call from a mobile.

fact_check_explanation_title: Here’s where those 5G and coronavirus conspiracy theories came from
fact_check_explanation_summary: Conspiracy theorists have been peddling 5G myths for a while now, we’ve only just started to listen.

fact_check_explanation_title: The 5G And Beyond Act is not a British law
fact_check_explanation_summary: The 5G And Beyond Act is not a British law. Nor is it about speeding up 5G installation.

fact_check_explanation_title: Do face masks protect against the new coronavirus?
fact_check_explanation_summary: The limited evidence suggests that wearing face masks in public, may help to reduce the spread of the new coronavirus specifically from people who have the virus but aren’t showing …
